perturbation.original_text: IAC shall comply with all applicable laws and regulations related to the manufacturing and/or production of the Products in jurisdictions in which IAC manufactures the Products, including labor and employment, environmental, safety, tax and other similar regulations. In addition, IAC currently complies and will continue to comply with any applicable regulations regarding foreign child labor laws and other abusive labor practices.
perturbation.changed_text: IAC shall comply with environmental, safety, tax and other similar regulations related to the manufacturing and/or production of the Products in jurisdictions in which IAC manufactures the Products.
perturbation.explanation: This change omits the legally mandated compliance with labor and employment laws and the specific assurance regarding foreign child labor laws and other abusive labor practices. This creates a legal contradiction as it removes a standard provision ensuring compliance with labor laws, potentially violating labor regulations in the jurisdiction where manufacturing occurs (Taiwan, R.O.C.) and the United States. Violating labor standards can lead to legal repercussions and reputational damage.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Fair Labor Standards Act (FLSA) (United States), labor laws of Taiwan, R.O.C.

perturbation.original_text: Each party agrees that it shall take reasonable measures to protect the secrecy of and avoid disclosure and unauthorized use of the Confidential Information of the other party. Without limiting the foregoing, each party shall take at least those measures that it takes to protect its own confidential information of a similar nature, but in no case less than reasonable care (including, without limitation, all precautions the receiving party employs with respect to its own confidential materials). No party shall make any copies of the other party's Confidential Information except upon the other party's prior written approval. Each party shall reproduce the other party's proprietary rights notices on any such authorized copies, in the same manner in which such notices were set forth in or on the original or otherwise that can clearly express the other party's proprietary rights. A party receiving Confidential Information shall promptly notify the party disclosing such Confidential Information of any use or disclosure of such Confidential Information in violation of this Agreement of which the receiving party becomes aware. Confidentiality shall be maintained for a period of [*] after expiration of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Each party agrees that it shall take reasonable measures to protect the secrecy of and avoid disclosure and unauthorized use of the Confidential Information of the other party. No party shall make any copies of the other party's Confidential Information except upon the other party's prior written approval. A party receiving Confidential Information shall promptly notify the party disclosing such Confidential Information of any use or disclosure of such Confidential Information in violation of this Agreement of which the receiving party becomes aware. Confidentiality shall be maintained for a period of [*] after expiration of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: Removing the part 'Without limiting the foregoing, each party shall take at least those measures that it takes to protect its own confidential information of a similar nature, but in no case less than reasonable care (including, without limitation, all precautions the receiving party employs with respect to its own confidential materials). Each party shall reproduce the other party's proprietary rights notices on any such authorized copies, in the same manner in which such notices were set forth in or on the original or otherwise that can clearly express the other party's proprietary rights.' weakens the obligation to protect confidentiality, this creates a risk of inadequate protection of confidential information, leading to potential breaches of contract and violations of trade secret laws.
perturbation.contradicted_law: California Uniform Trade Secrets Act (CUTSA) (California), Defend Trade Secrets Act (DTSA) (United States)

perturbation.original_text: IAC agrees to use commercially reasonable efforts to maintain Sonos Tools in good, satisfactory working condition and to keep Sonos Tools fully covered under IAC's property insurance at all times and without expense to Sonos. IAC will be responsible for physical loss of or damage to the Sonos Tools while in the possession or control of IAC. IAC is solely responsible for installing, testing, and maintaining Sonos Tools in its control in good working condition and in compliance with applicable manufacturing specifications, for purchasing and maintaining spare parts to repair such Sonos Tools with a minimum of downtime, and for any risk of loss in connection with the Sonos Tools. Normal maintenance of Sonos Tools will be at Sonos' expense. In the event that a Sonos Tool is damaged beyond what is considered normal wear and tear, it shall be the responsibility of IAC or its designated suppliers to notify Sonos within one (1) working day. It shall be the [*] responsibility of [*] to bear the full repair or replacement cost of a damaged Sonos Tool, [*]. All Sonos Tool repairs shall be made to the satisfaction of applicable manufacturing specifications.
perturbation.changed_text: IAC agrees to use commercially reasonable efforts to maintain Sonos Tools in good, satisfactory working condition. IAC is solely responsible for installing, testing, and maintaining Sonos Tools in its control in good working condition and in compliance with applicable manufacturing specifications. Normal maintenance of Sonos Tools will be at Sonos' expense.
perturbation.explanation: This change removes the obligation for IAC to keep Sonos Tools fully covered under IAC's property insurance at all times. And also the line for In the event that a Sonos Tool is damaged beyond what is considered normal wear and tear, it shall be the responsibility of IAC or its designated suppliers to notify Sonos within one (1) working day. It shall be the [*] responsibility of [*] to bear the full repair or replacement cost of a damaged Sonos Tool, [*]. This makes Sonos bear the cost of repair, it removes insurance protection for Sonos's property, it introduces significant financial risk for Sonos in case of loss or damage, potentially violating implied duties of care and creating a legal dispute over liability.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Implied duties of care under contract law (California)
